thread.title: Mr R Dix
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Mr R Dix

author: Mr R Dix
title: Mr R Dix
text: Brilliant service in sourcing a difficult to obtain part, other suppliers unable to so do. Communication was excellent and I was kept up to date with progress. Once sourced they let me know and despatched the part immediately. A first rate company to do business with - will definitely use again.
